headline.print_headline: McCutchen Has 4 Hits in Pirates' Rout of Phillies
headline.main: McCutchen Has 4 Hits in Pirates' Rout of Phillies

docs.snippet: Andrew McCutchen went 4 for 5 and finished a home run short of a cycle, and Jordy Mercer drove in a career-high four runs to lead the Pittsburgh Pirates to an 8-2 rout of the Philadelphia Phillies on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andrew McCutchen went 4 for 5 and finished a home run short of a cycle, and Jordy Mercer drove in a career-high four runs to lead the Pittsburgh Pirates to an 8-2 rout of the Philadelphia Phillies on Friday.

headline.print_headline: New Bolivia Law Would Allow 10-Year-Olds to Work
headline.main: New Bolivia Law Would Allow 10-Year-Olds to Work

docs.snippet: Bolivia's Congress has passed legislation to allow children as young age 10 to work as long as it does not interfere with their education and is done independently to help the child's family make ends meet....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bolivia's Congress has passed legislation to allow children as young age 10 to work as long as it does not interfere with their education and is done independently to help the child's family make ends meet.

headline.print_headline: Cabrera's Error Helps A's Beat Jays 1-0 in 12th
headline.main: Cabrera's Error Helps A's Beat Jays 1-0 in 12th

docs.snippet: Melky Cabrera couldn't corral Nick Punto's double with one out in the 12th inning, sending the Oakland Athletics to a 1-0 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Melky Cabrera couldn't corral Nick Punto's double with one out in the 12th inning, sending the Oakland Athletics to a 1-0 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays on Friday.

headline.sub: Wedding bells for Van der Sloot
headline.main: Wedding bells for Van der Sloot

docs.snippet: Dutch national Joran van der Sloot, in prison for killing a Peruvian woman, marries his pregnant girlfriend from behind bars. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dutch national Joran van der Sloot, in prison for killing a Peruvian woman, marries his pregnant girlfriend from behind bars. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

docs.snippet: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford heckled by shirtless jogger during Canada Day parade. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....

headline.print_headline: Protesters Gather, Await Arrival of Undocumented Immigrants in California
headline.main: Protesters Gather, Await Arrival of Undocumented Immigrants in California

docs.snippet: Immigration demonstrations intensified in a southern California town on Friday as protesters filled a desolate road to a U.S. Customs and Border Station to await the arrival of undocumented Central American families for processing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Immigration demonstrations intensified in a southern California town on Friday as protesters filled a desolate road to a U.S. Customs and Border Station to await the arrival of undocumented Central American families for processing.

docs.snippet: Police in the San Francisco Bay Area have arrested a 14-year-old boy on suspicion of shooting and wounding an 11-year-old boy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in the San Francisco Bay Area have arrested a 14-year-old boy on suspicion of shooting and wounding an 11-year-old boy.

headline.print_headline: What to Watch in Last 2 World Cup Quarterfinals
headline.main: What to Watch in Last 2 World Cup Quarterfinals

docs.snippet: The world's best player goes up against perhaps the world's best goalkeeper. The highest-scoring lineup in the World Cup takes on the tournament's most surprising team....
docs.lead_paragraph: The world's best player goes up against perhaps the world's best goalkeeper. The highest-scoring lineup in the World Cup takes on the tournament's most surprising team.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Striker Neymar to Miss Rest of World Cup
headline.main: Brazil Striker Neymar to Miss Rest of World Cup

docs.snippet: With tears streaming down his face after being kneed in the back, Neymar was carried off the field on a stretcher....
docs.lead_paragraph: With tears streaming down his face after being kneed in the back, Neymar was carried off the field on a stretcher.

headline.print_headline: SEC Settles With Canadian Man Tied to Penny Stock Scam
headline.main: SEC Settles With Canadian Man Tied to Penny Stock Scam

docs.snippet: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has reached a settlement with a Montreal man it accused of fraud, barring the man from any future offerings of so-called penny stocks....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has reached a settlement with a Montreal man it accused of fraud, barring the man from any future offerings of so-called penny stocks.
